Address.label: Address
Address.value: 3333 DEPOSIT,DRIVE NE, GRAND RAPIDS, Michigan, 49546, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Northpointe Bancshares operates its business primarily through its wholly-owned banking subsidiary, Northpointe Bank. Our business offers a nationwide mortgage purchase program, residential mortgage loans, digital deposit banking to our retail customers and custodial deposit services to our loan servicing clients. Our delivery systems are primarily digital and are available to clients nationwide, and we provide our staff with loan production offices across 23 cities in 15 states and support them through our centralized operating center in Grand Rapids, Michigan. Our nationwide presence has enabled us to have clients in all 50 states and the District of Columbia.
